Package controller

package controller
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AllCaregiversController
    The AllCaregiversController contains the entire logic of the Caregiver view.
    AllPatientController
    The AllPatientController contains the entire logic of the patient view.
    AllTreatmentController
     
    AllUserController
    Logical Layer of the AllUserView Contains Button-Events and fills Tables
    ChangePasswordController
    Logical Layer of the ChangePasswordView
    Handles the Process of changing and confirming the Password
    Controller
    abstract class for the controller and permission managment

    please keep in mind, that the Controller is connected to the View programmatically Controller.create(), adding your controller to your View-FXML will end in a total disaster.
    ControllerManager
    Singleton to keep the Controller-Instances in the Memory
    LoginController
    logic of the login process
    Main
    the main class, the entry point
    MainWindowController
    homepage of the application
    NewTreatmentController
     
    NewUserAccountController
    Logical Layer of the NewUserAccount View
    Contains the Logic to create a new User Account and for ButtonEvents
    TreatmentController
